ygData.subject: SSS tips
ygData.msgSnippet: Looking way ahead in my questing, I ve wondered if any of you have had any luck with our newly placed mob in the Hole, the scalekeeper type person. Has it been
ygData.messageBody:
Looking way ahead in my questing, I've wondered if any of you have had any
luck with our newly placed mob in the Hole, the scalekeeper type person.
Has it been confirmed that he drops both white and red dragonscales? He's
said to be L55. Does he fight like VS? And since I've personally been on no
raids on VS, I don't know the tactics used on him either. If anyone would be
able to sneak in some secrets on how to kill this scalekeeper, or if he does
in fact fight like Venril Sathir, how to defeat him.

And is it true that the "spawned" or "mini" Trakanon is just L55, which
drops only the guts for our quest? About how many would it take, and approx
Levels to defeat him at this level?

Thank you in advance for any information you all can provide for our fellow
bards who read the list ;)

Pava Rahti <Intrepid Spirits>
54 Bard on Cazic Thule
